LanguageData.Manger.label: Manger[ZP]
LanguageData.Manger.description: Named after the trough farm animals eat from, this livestock feed is high in nutrition, and aims to be the best solution for animal diets on the Rim.
LanguageData.PetFood.label: Pet Food[ZP]
LanguageData.PetFood.description: Pet food, livestock feed, animal chow, and compulsory fourth name to pad out the list. It's less nutritious than Manger, but animals will eat it all the same.
LanguageData.ZP_FishFood.label: FishFood[ZP]
LanguageData.ZP_FishFood.description: 米ぬかとジャガイモを水で練り合わせて作った魚の練り餌。\n動物も食べることが出来る。
LanguageData.ZP_Earthworm.label: EarthWorm[ZP]
